title: User Signup with Valid Data and Initial Capital
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign up with valid email, password, name, optional WhatsApp, and initial capital amount, and is redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Enter valid email, password (min 6 chars), name, optional WhatsApp, and valid initial capital (non-negative)
Submit signup form
Verify user is successfully created and redirected automatically to the dashboard
Verify an initial capital transaction is created and organization balance updated accordingly

title: User Signup with Invalid Email Format
description: Verify that signup fails when the user provides an invalid email format.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Enter invalid email format, valid password, name, and other details
Submit signup form
Verify signup is rejected with a validation error about invalid email format

title: User Signup Duplicate Email Prevention
description: Verify that signup is prevented if the email already exists in the system.

steps.description: Attempt to signup with an email that already exists
Verify signup is rejected with error indicating user already exists

title: User Signin with Correct Credentials
description: Validate successful login using existing user email and password, redirecting to dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to signin page
Enter valid registered email and correct password
Submit login form
Verify successful login and redirection to dashboard

title: User Signin with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login failure when user enters incorrect password or non-registered email.

steps.description: Navigate to signin page
Enter valid email with incorrect password
Submit login form
Verify login is failed with invalid credentials error

title: Password Visibility Toggle Functionality
description: Verify the eye icon toggles password input between masked and visible states and changes icon accordingly in signup and login forms.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Enter any password
Password input type is 'password' and eye icon is 'EyeOff'
Click eye icon to toggle visibility
Password input type changes to 'text' and eye icon switches to 'Eye'
Click eye icon again to toggle back
Password input type changes back to 'password' and icon switches to 'EyeOff'

title: Initial Capital Registration Restriction
description: Verify that initial capital can only be registered once per organization and rejects duplicate attempts.

steps.description: Perform signup for organization with initial capital registration
Attempt to register initial capital again via API or UI for same organization
Verify operation is rejected with error indicating capital already registered

title: Add Expense with Valid Data
description: Verify ability to add a new expense with all required fields valid, including category, non-negative amount, description, and correct status.

steps.description: Navigate to add expense dialog or API endpoint
Input expense details with valid organization id, type 'EXPENSE', valid category, description, amount >= 0, valid status, due date, and optional notes
Submit the expense
Verify the expense is successfully created and saved with correct details
Verify dashboard updates automatically to reflect new expense

title: Add Expense with Missing Required Fields
description: Verify validation errors occur when required fields like category, description, or amount are missing when adding expenses.

steps.description: Attempt to add expense missing required fields such as category or amount
Verify submission is rejected with validation errors for missing fields

title: Add Expense with Negative Amount
description: Verify that adding an expense with a negative amount value is rejected.

steps.description: Attempt to add expense with negative amount value
Verify submission is rejected with an error indicating amount must be non-negative

title: Dashboard Financial Data Real-Time Display
description: Verify that the dashboard correctly displays the up-to-date current balance, active projects, new clients, and upcoming shoots based on the latest database state.

steps.description: Login as user and navigate to dashboard
Verify current balance matches the calculated value from initial capital, expenses, and receipts
Verify active projects count and details are correct and up-to-date
Verify new clients count is accurate
Verify upcoming shoots list matches scheduled data

title: Equipment Reservation Conflict Prevention
description: Verify the system prevents double booking of the same equipment on overlapping dates with appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Reserve equipment item A for a given date range successfully
Attempt to reserve the same equipment item A for overlapping date range
Verify reservation is blocked with message indicating equipment is already booked for the selected date(s)

title: Kanban Board Stage Validations and Notifications
description: Verify that moving a project stage on the Kanban board enforces required data validation for that stage and triggers email notifications upon successful stage changes.

steps.description: Attempt to move project to next stage without completing required fields
Verify move is blocked with validation error indicating missing required information
Complete required fields and move project stage on Kanban
Verify stage change is successful and automated email notification is sent to relevant stakeholders

title: Interactive Proposal Video Embedding and Real-Time Pricing
description: Verify that interactive proposal pages correctly embed audiovisual portfolio videos and update pricing in real time based on client feature selections.

steps.description: Access proposal landing page with unique token
Verify embedded portfolio videos load and play correctly
Select or deselect optional features on the proposal
Verify pricing updates correctly and in real time as features are changed

title: Client Media Review Approvals and Version History
description: Verify that clients can approve or request changes on video review pages, version histories update automatically, and project stages progress accordingly.

steps.description: Client accesses media review link
Client submits approval
Verify project stage automatically progresses to next appropriate stage
Client requests changes to the media
Verify new version history entry is recorded and project stage remains unchanged

title: User Signout Flow
description: Verify that a logged-in user can successfully sign out and is redirected or logged out appropriately.

steps.description: Sign in with valid credentials
Trigger signout action
Verify user session ends and user is redirected to login page or public landing
